The messy room (G10) contains a metal vice and a wood vice that belong to the Hackspace.

The metal vice is roughly in the middle of the room, attached to a metal bench, with a Hackspace equipment label on it. The wooden vice is on the bench just to the right as you turn into the door.

Try not to crush your hands in them!

It can be a good idea to protect the surface of the item you are clamping with some scrap pieces of wood, too, or the vice jaws will scratch things.
